ai.summary: Camborne FP 25 Ground truth is a very short, easy hike in the UK, covering 0.4 km. The route is suitable for all ages and can be completed in just a few minutes, making it ideal for a quick outdoor escape.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, on a well-maintained footpath. Expect a level surface with possible gravel or tarmac sections. It may be muddy after rain and could have gentle slopes near entry or exit points.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather and daylight hours before setting out. Wear comfortable, well-fitting walking shoes and bring a light layer if rain is possible. Stay on the designated path, give way to other pedestrians, and keep an eye out for uneven surfaces or puddles. Carry a charged phone with emergency contacts and know your return time.
ai.best_seasons: All year round; spring and summer typically offer the best conditions, but the short length also makes it a quick option in autumn and mild winter days.
